caseTitle: Government of Balochistan through secretary Mines & Minerals Department, Quetta & Another v. Attock Cement Pak Ltd., Karachi
authorJudge: Mr. Justice Syed Hasan Azhar Rizvi
tagline: A notification that has received ex-post facto approval by the cabinet is deemed to be valid from the date of its approval and, thus, cannot be made applicable retrospectively.
